name: 數位教學設計
description: There are two major goals of this course: a) to foster an comprehensive understanding of the knowledge domain of instructional design for e-Learning, and b) to acquire expertise in designing and conducting instructional design for e-Learning courseware.
goals: foster an understanding of the fundamental principles of learning and memory.
syllabus:
第01週 課程簡介與說明 

第02週 Meaningful Online Learning: Integrating Strategies, Activities, and Learning Technologies for Effective Designs (I)

第03週 Meaningful Online Learning: Integrating Strategies, Activities, and Learning Technologies for Effective Designs (II)

第04週 Meaningful Online Learning: Integrating Strategies, Activities, and Learning Technologies for Effective Designs (III)

第05週 Meaningful Online Learning: Integrating Strategies, Activities, and Learning Technologies for Effective Designs (V)

第06週 系統化教學設計的概念與過程

第07週 校際活動日放假1日

第08週 擴增實境教學應用教材分析

第09週 期中課堂考試（範圍：Meaningful Online Learning: Integrating Strategies, Activities, and Learning Technologies for Effective Designs）

第10週 虛擬實境教學應用教材分析

第11週 擴增實境／虛擬實境教學應用教材設計

第12週 擴增實境／虛擬實境教學應用活動設計

第13週 擴增實境／虛擬實境開發工具介紹: Unity 3D

第14週 擴增實境學習系統開發(I)

第15週 擴增實境學習系統開發(II)

第16週 虛擬實境與遊戲式學習系統開發(I)

第17週 虛擬實境與遊戲式學習系統開發(II)

第18週 期末專題展示與評分 (AR/VR or Game-based Learning System)
